briefdescription.para: Clamp a float to the symmetric INT4 range [-7, +7] and convert to int.
Pack two signed 4-bit integers (in [-7, +7]) into a single byte.

detaileddescription.para: Values are first biased by +8 to map them to [1, 15] (0 is unused here), then stored as low/high nibbles: low for even column, high for odd column.

briefdescription.para: Unpack two signed 4-bit integers from a single byte.

parameterdescription.para: Output pointer for low-nibble decoded value in [-8, +7].
Output pointer for high-nibble decoded value in [-8, +7].

briefdescription.para: Return true if any of a, b, c is NaN or infinite.

detaileddescription.para: See Ie_int4_quant for API details and packing rules.
